briefdescription.para: Creates a new BGridView and targets it.

detaileddescription.para: Methods called on this builder will be directed to the new BGridView's BGridLayout.

parameterdescription.para: The horizontal spacing for the new BGridLayout.
The vertical spacing for the new BGridLayout.

briefdescription.para: Creates a new BGridLayout, and attaches it to a BWindow.

simplesect.para: The top BView* in window has its ViewColor set to B_PANEL_BACKGROUND_COLOR.

parameterdescription.para: Thew BWindow* to attach the newly created BGroupLayout to.
The horizontal spacing for the new BGridLayout.
The vertical spacing for the new BGridLayout.

briefdescription.para: Creates a builder targeting an existing view.

The vertical spacing for the new BGroupLayout.

briefdescription.para: Creates a builder targeting an existing BGridLayout.

parameterdescription.para: The BGridLayout to target with this builder.

briefdescription.para: Creates a builder targeting a BGridView.

detaileddescription.para: Methods called on this builder will be directed to view->GridLayout().

parameterdescription.para: The BGridView this builder will target.

detaileddescription.para: Get a pointer to the layout this builder represents.
Get a pointer to the BView this builder's layout is attached to.
Get the layout this builder represents.

The column number (zero-index) to use.

memberdef.name: Add

memberdef.argsstring: (BMenuField *menuField, int32 column, int32 row, alignment labelAlignment=B_ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_UNSET, int32 labelColumnCount=1, int32 fieldColumnCount=1, int32 rowCount=1)
memberdef.name: AddMenuField

briefdescription.para: Add a BMenuField to the layout.

detaileddescription.para:
item
The BMenuField to be added.
column
The column number (zero-index) to use.
row
The row number (zero-index) to use.
labelAlignment
The alignment of the label to use. Choices include:
B_ALIGN_LEFT
B_ALIGN_RIGHT
B_ALIGN_CENTER
B_ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_CENTER
B_ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_UNSET
B_ALIGN_USE_FULL_WIDTH
labelColumnCount
The number of columns the label will span over.
fieldColumnCount
The number of columns the menu field will span over.
rowCount
The number of rows to span over.
A BMenuField is composed of a label and a menu. This method allows to lay the sub-components in separate grid cells, allowing easy alignment of the menu with other items in the layout.

memberdef.argsstring: (BTextControl *textControl, int32 column, int32 row, alignment labelAlignment=B_ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_UNSET, int32 labelColumnCount=1, int32 textColumnCount=1, int32 rowCount=1)
memberdef.name: AddTextControl

briefdescription.para: Add a BMenuField to the layout.

detaileddescription.para:
item
The BMenuField to be added.
column
The column number (zero-index) to use.
row
The row number (zero-index) to use.
labelAlignment
The alignment of the label to use. Choices include:
B_ALIGN_LEFT
B_ALIGN_RIGHT
B_ALIGN_CENTER
B_ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_CENTER
B_ALIGN_HORIZONTAL_UNSET
B_ALIGN_USE_FULL_WIDTH
labelColumnCount
The number of columns the label will span over.
textColumnCount
The number of columns the text field will span over.
rowCount
The number of rows to span over.
A BTextControl is composed of a label and a text area. This method allows to lay the sub-components in separate grid cells, allowing easy alignment of the text area with other items in the layout.

sectiondef.header: Adding BLayouts and their BView Pairs

description.para: A set of methods that add a BLayout or BView subclass and return a BLayoutBuilder::Base subclass representing the newly added object. These methods push a new builder on top of the stack, you will not be using this builder again until you call End().

description.para: These methods expose some settings of the underlying grid layout.

detaileddescription.para: Set the spacing between columns for this layout.

parameterdescription.para: The number of pixels of spacing to set.

detaileddescription.para: Set the spacing between rows for this layout.

parameterdescription.para: The number of pixels of spacing to set.

detaileddescription.para: Set the spacing between columns and rows for this layout.

parameterdescription.para: The number of horizontal pixels of spacing to set.
The number of vertical pixels of spacing to set.

detaileddescription.para: Set the weight for column to weight.

parameterdescription.para: The column to set.
The weight to set.

detaileddescription.para: Set the weight of row to weight.

parameterdescription.para: The row number.
The weight to set.

memberdef.argsstring: (float left, float top, float right, float bottom)
memberdef.name: SetInsets

detaileddescription.para: Set the insets for this layout.

Set the spacing around the edges of this layout. If you pass B_USE_DEFAULT_SPACING for a certain parameter, that parameter will be replaced with the value returned by BControlLook::DefaultItemSpacing().
Set the insets for this layout.
This is a convenience method to easily set similar insets.

parameterdescription.para: The insets to the left and right of the layout.
The insets at the top and bottom of the layout.

detaileddescription.para: Set the insets for this layout.
This is a convenience method that to easily set all the insets of the layout to the same value.

parameterdescription.para: The inset to be applied to left, top, right and bottom of this layout.

detaileddescription.para: Set the explicit minimum size of the underlying layout.
Set the explicit maximum size of the underlying layout.
Set the explicit preferred size of the underlying layout.
Set the explicit alignment of the underlying layout.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddCards() methods.

Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddGroup() methods.
Shorthand for builders returned by this builder's AddSplit() methods.
Shorthand representing the type of this.

Haiku R1
Each item is added to the grid layout at (column, row) and may span multiple columns and rows.
